workflow.name: Order Confirmation Email
workflow.description: Sends confirmation email to customer when new order is created

email_template.name: order_confirmation
email_template.subject: Order Confirmed - Happily Ever Bakers 🍪
email_template.html_content:
🍪 Happily Ever Bakers

Order Confirmed!

Dear {{customer_name}},

Thank you for your order! We're excited to bake your delicious cookies fresh just for you.

Order Details

Order Number: {{order_number}}

Total Items: {{total_items}}

Total Value: ${{total_value}}

Delivery Address: {{delivery_address}}

📋 Order Now, Invoice Later!
No payment required upfront. We'll send you an invoice shortly for payment.

What's Next?

  • 📧 You'll receive an invoice for payment
  • 🍪 We'll start baking your fresh cookies
  • 📦 You'll get updates as your order progresses
  • 🚚 We'll deliver your cookies fresh and delicious

If you have any questions or special requests, please don't hesitate to contact us.

Thank you for choosing Happily Ever Bakers!

Best regards,
The Happily Ever Bakers Team
